the Justice has upheld a federal law
that bans people convicted of domestic
violence from owning guns but here's a
problem our federal laws have loopholes
for example only 17 states require all
those with domestic violence restraining
orders to turn in their firearms federal
law prohibits convicted abusers from
owning firearms if they are married but
if you're just dated and decided to

another gun yep the boyfriend loophole
I'm grateful that in my state if a
boyfriend or girlfriend convicted of
domestic violence is ordered to turn in
their guns they must do so or face
arrest saving the lives of law
enforcement and the abused is a non
partisan issue in 2017 eight governors
from both parties ignored pressure from

and look I understand criminals will

already have a violent record with
